sentences.sContent: We represent the last vestige of what made this nation great – hard work.
sentences.sCn: 我们代表了曾经使这个国家伟大的仅存的品质–勤奋。

remMethod.val: vestig(脚印) + e → 留下的脚印 → 痕迹， 遗迹

words.tran: 退化的；残余的；发育不全的

trans.tranOther: a small part or amount of something that remains when most of it no longer exists
